literals.literal: Visit www.movisol.com for more free iPhone applications

Each quiz you take will have 4 questions for 1 point each. Check the achievement section to know your total score.
You get following badges for the total score:
Bronze Badge Score: 13 to 26
Silver Badge Score: 27 to 39
Golden Badge Score : above 39
I have been playing with this iPhone application and I thought you might like it.

<style type="text/css">

body{
color: #000000;
text-align: center;
margin:0px 0px;
font-size: 13px; 
font-family: Helvetica; 
line-height: 130%;
}


.separator{
height:15px;
}

/* ---- HOME ---- */

#homeBox{
font-size: 14px;
margin:5px 5px 5px 5px;
line-height: 130%;
}

/* ---- CREDITS ---- */

#aboutBox
{
	color: #010101; 
	font-size: 14px; 
	font-family: helvetica; 
	text-align: center; 
}

#aboutBox a
{
	color: #010101;
}

#localCreditsBox
{
	color: #010101; 
	font-size: 14px; 
	font-family: helvetica; 
	text-align: center; 
}

#localCreditsBox a
{
	color: #010101;
}



/* ---- RESULTS ---- */ 

#resultBox
{
font-family: MarkerFelt-Thin; 
line-height: 150%;
margin:5px 5px 5px 5px;
font-size: 16px;
display: table-cell; 
vertical-align: middle;
height:173px;
color: #ffffff;
}

/* ---- TIP ---- */

#postQuestionTipBox, #preQuestionTipBox {
width: 287px; 
height: 265px; 
padding-left: 40px;
padding-right: 30px;
display: table-cell; 
vertical-align: middle;
font-family: Helvetica; 
line-height: 130%;
font-size: 16px; 
color: #000000;
}

#preQuestionTipBox h1, #postQuestionTipBox h1
{
font-size:24px;
line-height: 130%;
}

</style>
